mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into app_version (appId, versionNo, publishStatus, downloadLink, versionSize, create_time, uodate_time, apkLocPath, apkFileName, versionInfo) values (#{appid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{versionno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{downloadlink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionsize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uodateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{apklocpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apkfilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versioninfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update app_version set appId = #{appid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, versionNo = #{versionno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publishStatus = #{publishstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, downloadLink = #{downloadlink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, versionSize = #{versionsize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uodate_time = #{uodateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apkLocPath = #{apklocpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apkFileName = #{apkfilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, versionInfo = #{versioninfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, appId, versionNo, publishStatus, downloadLink, versionSize, create_time, uodate_time, apkLocPath, apkFileName, versionInfo from app_version where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, appId, versionNo, publishStatus, downloadLink, versionSize, create_time, uodate_time, apkLocPath, apkFileName, versionInfo from app_version
